Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
SummonShip = Tool:WaitForChild("SummonShip")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
ReloadTime = 5
ShipSize = 10
Damage = 60
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false if SummonShipAnim then SummonShipAnim:Stop() end SummonShipAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(SummonShip) if SummonShipAnim then SummonShipAnim:Play(0.1, 1, 4) end local Ship = Handle:Clone() Handle.Transparency = 1 Ship.Transparency = 0.35 Ship.Size = Vector3.new((Ship.Size.X * ShipSize), (Ship.Size.Y * ShipSize), (Ship.Size.Z * ShipSize)) Ship.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new((Ship.Mesh.Scale.X * ShipSize), (Ship.Mesh.Scale.Y * ShipSize), (Ship.Mesh.Scale.Z * ShipSize)) Ship.CanCollide = false Debris:AddItem(Ship, 10) local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(((Ship:GetMass() * 100) * 100), ((Ship:GetMass() * 100) * 100), ((Ship:GetMass() * 100) * 100)) BodyVelocity.Parent = Ship local HitDebounce = false Ship.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and not HitDebounce then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and humanoid and character ~= Character then HitDebounce = true UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) Ship.Anchored = true for i = 1, 65, 0.1 do Ship.Transparency = Ship.Transparency + 0.1 wait() end Ship:Destroy() end end end) Ship.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Ship.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, ((Torso.Size.Y * 3) + (Ship.Size.Y / 2)), 0) Ship.CFrame = CFrame.new(Ship.Position, Humanoid.TargetPoint) BodyVelocity.velocity = CFrame.new(Ship.Position, Humanoid.TargetPoint).lookVector * 100 wait(ReloadTime) Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Player) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped() Handle.Transparency = 0 if SummonShipAnim then SummonShipAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
